title: [Self-Directed] Gamification-Based Intensive Short-Term Course on 3D Graphic Software

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment process in smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environments, with mathematics applied to understanding geometric principles in 3D modeling.

learning_goals: Learners can create simple 3D objects (shapes, basic structures) using basic functions of 3D modeling software within a week.
Learners maintain learning engagement by completing over 80% of daily missions through gamification elements.
Learners complete personalized 3D projects by modifying over five templates provided through example-based learning (EBL).

resources: Mobile-optimized 3D software apps (Blender Mobile, Tinkercad Mobile)
Gamification platform mobile versions (e.g., Kahoot! or Classcraft)
3D example library (STL files and tutorial videos)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
